title: Introduction to vLLM: A High-Performance LLM Serving Engine
author: Janakiram MSV
description: Created at UC Berkeley, this community-driven library addresses memory management, throughput optimization and scalable deployment in LLM applications.
cntitle: vLLM 简介：一款高性能 LLM 服务引擎
cndescription: 这个社区驱动的库由加州大学伯克利分校创建，旨在解决 LLM 应用中的内存管理、吞吐量优化和可扩展部署问题。
